content: welcome to the world of dizzy the duck a delightful crochet pattern perfect for beginners and seasoned crafters alike this adorable duck toy stands at 5 inches tall and 4 5 inches long making it a charming addition to any amigurumi collection the pattern is worked in the round from top-down and includes detailed written instructions to guide you through every stitch whether you re crafting for a toddler child or teen dizzy the duck is sure to bring joy and whimsy to your crochet projects get your hooks ready to bring this lovable duck to life **unique features-** beginner-friendly crochet pattern perfect for crocheting toys and animals available in multiple sizes for different age groups worked in the round for seamless construction adorable amigurumi design materials needed- 90 yards 82 30 meters of aran weight yarn such as hobby lobby s i love this yarn solids 3 25 mm us size 3 0 crochet hook gauge 5 stitches and 6 row = 1 inch in single_crochet
